text: <!channel>: just so nobody misses it, since we've just merged in user table changes, the user table is going to get rewritten
<@U0J0D1KE3>: Are you guys rewritting the user table or is that a task that’s up for grabs? P.s. I’m so used to typing out your handle as stevar.
umm <@U0J0A2MTL> can you answer this, i just wanted to make sure nobody gets alarmed when the table has different content than they remembered

If we run the UserConnection.sync({force: true}), all the tables will be erased, with new columns in the user table.  If you are talking about the mockaroo thing, generating new fake users with more data is 'up for grabs'.
